name: Flick Kick Rugby
description:
Another addictive addition to the Flick Kick by Pikpok series!

*As featured in the new Apple iPod Touch TV ad!* Will you score the game winning kick? Flick Kick™ Rugby brings intuitive, quick to play, on the go fun. Play for a few minutes or several hours!

Challenge yourself to see if you have what it takes to be the hero on the day and win the match for your team. Flick Kick Rugby features 

○ Intuitive Flick Kicking
○ Realistic Rugby Pitch
○ Multiple Game Modes including Sudden Death, Arcade Mode, Time Attack, and Practice
○ Online Multiplayer
○ Pass and Play Multiplayer
○ Online Leaderboards and Achievements
○ Stunning 3D graphics! 

http://pikpok.com/games/flick-kick-rugby

Want to try before you buy?  Check out Flick Kick Rugby Kickoff!
